條件：打破鏡子#救出Janny","Thank you for saving me.","You're welcome. I'm a brave adventurer who came to the Okeelia Continent.","My name is Janny. I'm the secretary of the organization fighting against the Demon Queen.","Why were you trapped inside a mirror?","Because I have a lot of knowledge about the Demon Queen and pose a great threat to him. But I was carelessly captured by his minions, and they used magic to trap me inside this mirror.","I see. I'm on my way to challenge the Demon Queen. Can you assist me?","Of course. By the customs of the Okeelia Continent, since you saved my life, you are now my master. I will serve you wholeheartedly.","Master? Haha, can I ask you to do anything?","Well... (Hao Jiali shows a shy expression) not just anything. It depends on how you behave.","What do you mean by 'how I behave'?","You'll find out soon enough. Anyway, I'll be by your side. If you have any problems, summon me. I'll take my leave now.","Wait a moment. Where should I go next?","Head to Rainbow Valley. To defeat the Demon Queen, you'll need to gather many artifacts. Let's start with Rainbow Valley."
